response.message: A family that keeps growing. Very nice.
Good fluff post to distract us from the Summer of Love disaster. Nice work guys, nice work...

Yes, indeed, that's exactly how it works, we have a meeting and decided "Oh no! The summer of love disaster is threatening to blow up in our faces! Time to blog about some new employees!" You caught us.

I believe that is a sarcastic comment that has no place on our network! Begone with you, "Joel Spolsky", whoever you are!

Here we share only love and tenderness, with the occasional downvote!

<3
(also that Ace Ventura picture is AWESOME; welcome all new folks. Especially those with Ace Ventura costume pics.)

Developer-centric, but 17 in Sales for 12 in Development :)

What are you selling? Just careers and ads?
Welcome to Stack Overflow Family. One day i too would like to join this family.

A "Sales Team" of 17 guys just for selling Stack Exchange stuffed unicorns?
Please, hire me :)!

@Mark 
Actually, I do love the Summer of Love.

They're selling the "Summer of Love". An idea takes a lot more to sell than a product. Especially one that can't decide what it is and conflicts with itself. I'm waiting for the Era of Self-Esteem to end.

Disclaimer for the thin-sleeved. (Please note, this snarky post is sarcasm. I have every love for SO and its goals.)
That's a full sales team. Well done! (No sales = no SO = sad Augusto)
Wow, lots of new faces! Congrats and welcome, new SE recruits. The army grows...
